          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical and physical changes in matches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemikalie- und Systemteständerungen in den 
Übereinstimmungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements de produit chimique et d'examen 
médical des allumettes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças do produto químico e do exame nos 
fósforos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti di fisico medica e del prodotto 
chimico nelle corrispondenze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές και φυσικές αλλαγές στις αντιστοιχίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambios del producto químico y de la 
comprobación en emparejamientos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the difference between a chemical change and a physical change. Burning is a chemical change that makes a new substance.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">match</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Unterschied zwischen 
einer chemischen Umwandlung und einer körperlichen Änderung. 
Das Brennen ist eine chemische Umwandlung, die eine neue 
Substanz bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la différence entre un 
changement chimique et un changement physique. La brûlure est 
un changement chimique qui fait une nouvelle substance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a diferença entre uma 
mudança química e uma mudança física. Queimar-se é uma 
mudança química que faça uma substância nova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione evidenzia la differenza fra 
un cambiamento chimico e un cambiamento fisico. Bruciarsi è un 
cambiamento chimico che fa una nuova sostanza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διαφορά μεταξύ μιας 
χημικής αλλαγής και μιας φυσικής αλλαγής. Το κάψιμο είναι 
μια χημική αλλαγή που κάνει μια νέα ουσία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la diferencia entre un 
cambio químico y un cambio físico. El quemarse es un cambio 
químico que hace una sustancia nueva.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Umwandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feuer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übereinstimmung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliche Änderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le feu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">allumette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
